mapper.select: select change_type, user_type, id, type, name, ename, pinyin, gender, home_type, politics, nation, profession, birthday, native_place, certificate_type, certificate_no, phone, mphone, address, post_code, email, regionid, child_regionid, schoolid, groupid, classify, status, audit_status, confirm_status, back_operator, back_date, confirm_operator, confirm_date, operator, update_date, enabled_flag from stu_student_log where change_type = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_student_log ( change_type, user_type, id, type, name, ename, pinyin, gender, home_type, politics, nation, profession, birthday, native_place, certificate_type, certificate_no, phone, mphone, address, post_code, email, regionid, child_regionid, schoolid, groupid, classify, status, audit_status, confirm_status, back_operator, back_date, confirm_operator, confirm_date, operator, update_date ) values ( #{changeType}, #{userType}, #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{ename}, #{pinyin}, #{gender}, #{homeType}, #{politics}, #{nation}, #{profession}, #{birthday}, #{nativePlace}, #{certificateType}, #{certificateNo}, #{phone}, #{mphone}, #{address}, #{postCode}, #{email}, #{regionid}, #{childRegionid}, #{schoolid}, #{groupid}, #{classify}, #{status}, #{auditStatus}, #{confirmStatus}, #{backOperator}, #{backDate}, #{confirmOperator}, #{confirmDate}, #{operator}, now() )
mapper.update: update stu_student_log set enabled_flag =0 where change_type = #{value}

update stu_student_log set enabled_flag =0 where change_type in
#{changeType}
